lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's another slow day at the office today...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I"m boooored. I wonder what Keyna's doing right now.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: She must be swamped with clients. Surely it can't hurt to bring a few of those cases over to my side?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Maybe I'll drop by a visit.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: For... research. Reconnaissance. She IS my arch nemesis after all.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Not because I'm worried about her or anything.
-- A walk across the street later --

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: KEYNA!!!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: LOCKE?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Yo.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: You scared me! What are you doing here?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Aww, you missed me? I just thought I'd drop by and steal some of your clients.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Oh, so you have nothing better to do. Well don't you just have all the time in the world.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...That's more bitter than the usual remarks. What's up?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: What's up? Nothing's up. Everything's fine!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: No. W-well, I have a lot going on right now.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh... Is... there anything I can help with?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: What?! No! I don't need any help!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Besides, why are you offering help to your arch nemesis?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: You usually only get involved with my cases as a culprit.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I get that you helped me find my house key, but this case is none of your business.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ohh? Did our rising star detective finally hit a slump?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: It's not a slump! Even the police have been having trouble with the case, so it's just...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Oh heck, that's classified information. Why am I telling you this?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Besides, what I need right now is time to think!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I need peace and quiet and you're...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: You're distracting me!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Woah, hey! Quit pushing me out the door, I can walk you know?
*kerchunk* (locked/shut door sound?)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Sheesh, she's not in her best mood today.)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (None of my business huh...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (While that's certainly true, it kind of hurts to hear her say that.)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Why am I so hung up about this anyways?)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, if Keyna pushes herself too hard on this case and her business fails, then I wouldn't be able to leech off her clients anymore!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Yup, that must be why!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And I mean why wouldn't I take interest in a case that's stumping my arch nemesis!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: If I can solve it before her, that would mean I'm the SUPERIOR detective.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Heh... You're a genius, Locke.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Time for me to do some snooping.
